name: Whatever (itch)
description:
Use the arrows on the key board as you would in any other game.
Up arrow-jump
Right arrow-move towards the right of the screen
Left arrow-Move toward the left of the screen
Collect as many coins as possible and reach the door to get to the next level.
Avoid falling of the game.
Kirby needs to collect coins so he can go to the next level and buy the medicine for his pet, can you help him.
